mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARDID, B.TITLE, B.REGDATE, B.PRICE, BI.IMG, A.ADDRESSNAME FROM BOARD B, BOARD_IMG BI, ADDRESS A, MUSER MU WHERE MU.USERID = #{userId} AND B.ADDRESSCODE = MU.ADDRESS AND B.BOARDID = BI.BOARDID AND B.ADDRESSCODE = A.ADDRESSCODE

SELECT B.BOARDID, B.TITLE, B.REGDATE, B.PRICE, BI.IMG, A.ADDRESSNAME FROM BOARD B, BOARD_IMG BI, ADDRESS A WHERE A.ADDRESSCODE = (SELECT ADDRESSCODE FROM ADDRESS WHERE ADDRESSNAME = #{addressName}) AND B.ADDRESSCODE = A.ADDRESSCODE AND B.BOARDID = BI.BOARDID
SELECT A.ADDRESSNAME FROM ADDRESS A, USER_ADDRESS UA WHERE A.ADDRESSCODE = UA.ADDRESSCODE AND UA.USERID = #{userId}

SELECT B.BOARDID, B.TITLE, B.REGDATE, B.PRICE, BI.IMG, A.ADDRESSNAME FROM BOARD B, BOARD_IMG BI, ADDRESS A WHERE B.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' AND B.ADDRESSCODE = A.ADDRESSCODE AND B.BOARDID = BI.BOARDID

SELECT DISTINCT B.BOARDID, B.TITLE, B.REGDATE, B.PRICE, BI.IMG, A.ADDRESSNAME FROM BOARD B, BOARD_IMG BI, ADDRESS A, CATEGORIES C WHERE B.CATEGORYID = (SELECT CATEGORYID FROM CATEGORIES WHERE CATEGORYNAME = #{categoryName}) AND B.ADDRESSCODE = A.ADDRESSCODE AND B.BOARDID = BI.BOARDID ORDER BY BOARDID
